organizations.name: Organization for Autism Research
organizations.discription: Our intent with every dollar we raise and spend pursuing knowledge through research or creating resources is to offer support to self-advocates

organizations.name: autism speaks
organizations.discription: We’re working to create a kinder, more inclusive world for people with autism, and we invite you to join us.
organizations.address: 1 East 33rd Street 4th Floor New York, NY 10016

organizations.name: Brain & Behavior
organizations.discription: Committed to alleviating the suffering caused by mental illness by awarding grants that will lead to advances and breakthroughs in scientific research.
organizations.address: 747 Third Avenue, 33rd Floor New York, NY 10017

organizations.name: The color of autism
organizations.discription: Committed to serving people of color who are affected by Autism Spectrum Disorders. We are devoted to empowering families and lessening their isolation.
organizations.address: Calista Wise 7292 Dictum Av. San Antonio MI 47096

organizations.name: National Institutes of Health
organizations.discription: The NIH is the federal government's focal point for the support of biomedical research

organizations.name: US Autism Association
organizations.discription: Different Minded Renaissance, Inc., doing business as US Autism Association, is registered as a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization for autism education, support, and resources.
organizations.address: Cecilia Chapman 711-2880 Nulla St. Mankato Mississippi 96522

organizations.name: Southwest Autism Research & Resource Center
organizations.discription: To advance research and provide a lifetime of support for individuals with autism and their families.

organizations.name: National Autism Association
organizations.discription: The mission respond to the most urgent needs of the autism community, providing real help and hope so that all affected can reach their full potential.
organizations.address: One Park Avenue, Suite 1 Portsmouth, RI  02871

organizations.name: International Society for Autism Research
organizations.discription: To improve the lives of people affected by autism by promoting the highest quality research.

organizations.name: Center for Autism & Related Disorders
organizations.discription: Provides assistance with specific areas of concern for a family and develops and implements strategies to diminish challenging behaviors and teach necessary skills.
organizations.address: 21600 Oxnard St. Suite 1800 Woodland Hills, CA 91367

organizations.name: Autistic Self Advocacy Network
organizations.discription: Our activities include public policy advocacy, the development of autistic cultural activities, and leadership trainings for autistic self-advocates

organizations.name: The National Autism Resource and Information Center
organizations.discription: The National Autism Resource and Information Center will be a dynamic and interactive
